content.rendered:
Velvet Ranch is a private elk hunting ranch in east Idaho. The owner was looking for something that would really “wow” whoever was visiting the site, so we came up with the rifle idea across the navigation area. Velvet Ranch was also looking for a way to display 120 photos of hunts each year, and have all photos visible on the same page.

The other aspect of velvet ranch was a full National Internet Marketing Campaign. We are running pay-per-click advertising,  and search engine optimization across multiple keywords. Since the campaign began, Velvet Ranch has dramatically increase their online bookings.
